00039 /**
00040  * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00041  * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00042  * @return SelfDoc
00043  */
00044 SelfDoc CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::explainSelf()
00045 {
00046     SelfDoc doc;
00047     doc.setDocName(CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::getType());
00048     doc.setDocDescription(CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::getDescription());
00049     doc.setDocOptions(CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::getDefaultDocOptions());
00050     return doc;
00051 }
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00055  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00056  */
00057 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::getDefaultDocOptions()
00058 {
00059   std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00060 
00061   SelfDoc::Opt validityThreshold = {"role-validity-threshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Float, "1000.0", "1000.0", "0", "NA", " Paternity Role Validity Threshold"};
00062   opts.push_back(validityThreshold);
00063 
00064   SelfDoc::Opt errorRate = {"error-rate", SelfDoc::Opt::Float, "0.01", "0.01", "0.0", "1.0", " Paternity Error Rate"};
00065   opts.push_back(errorRate);
00066 
00067   return opts;
00068 }

00070 /**
00071  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00072  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00073  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00074  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00075  *
00076  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00077  *
00078  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00079  */
00080 SelfCreate* CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00081 {
00082     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00083     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00084     CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD* pMethod = new CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD();
00085     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00086     pMethod->m_fRoleValidityThreshold = setupFloatParameter("role-validity-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00087     pMethod->m_fErrorRate = setupFloatParameter("error-rate", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00088     pMethod->setDocName(getType());
00089     pMethod->setDocDescription(getDescription());
00090     // specify Calvin groups and datasets this analysis needs to read from cychp file
00091     pMethod->addGroupDataset("ProbeSets", "CopyNumber");
00092     pMethod->addGroupDataset("AlgorithmData", "MarkerABSignal");
00093     pMethod->addGroupDataset("Genotyping", "Calls");
00094     return pMethod;
00095 }

00097 /**
00098  * @brief Constructor
00099  */
00100 CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD()
00101 {
00102     m_fRoleValidityThreshold = 0.0;
00103     m_fErrorRate = 0.0;
00104     m_strAlleleFrequencyFileName = "";

00107 bool CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::readFile(const AffxString& strFileName) {
00108   affx::TsvFile tsv;
00109   tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00110   tsv.setAbortOnError(false);
00111   
00112   m_vAlleleFrequencies.reserve(affx::TsvFile::getLineCountInFile(strFileName, false));
00113 
00114   if ( tsv.openTable(strFileName) != affx::TSV_OK ) {
00115     return false;
00116   }
00117   std::string strSnpId;
00118   std::string strAAllele;
00119   std::string strBAllele;
00120   
00121   while (tsv.nextLevel(0)==affx::TSV_OK) {
00122     if( tsv.getColumnCount(0) == 3 ) {
00123       tsv.get(0,0,strSnpId);
00124       tsv.get(0,1,strAAllele);
00125       tsv.get(0,2,strBAllele);
00126       AlleleFrequency* p = new AlleleFrequency;
00127       p->SNPID = strSnpId;
00128       p->AAlleleFrequency = AffxByteArray(strAAllele).parseDouble();
00129       p->BAlleleFrequency = AffxByteArray(strBAllele).parseDouble();
00130       Verbose::out(4, std::string("strSnpId, strAAllele, strBAllele: ") + strSnpId + ", " +  strAAllele + ", " + strBAllele);
00131       m_vAlleleFrequencies.push_back(p);
00132     }
00133   }
00134   tsv.clear();
00135   std::sort(m_vAlleleFrequencies.begin(), m_vAlleleFrequencies.end(), AlleleFreqComp());
00136 
00137   return true;
00138 }

00140 bool CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::genotypeCallsAvailable(CNCychp& cychp)
00141 {
00142     // Elaborate as needed for future array types
00143     return cychp.getCychpHeader().getArrayType() == "CytoScanHD_Array";
00144 }

00146 /**
00147  * @brief Run the analysis.
00148  */
00149 void CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::run()
00150 {
00151     Verbose::out(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::run(...) start");
00152     Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::run(...) ", 5, 1, 5);
00153     CNCychp& cychpIndex  = getCychpIndex();
00154     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00155     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00156 
00157     if (!readFile(m_strAlleleFrequencyFileName))
00158     {
00159         Err::errAbort("Cannot open allele frequency file: " + m_strAlleleFrequencyFileName);
00160     }
00161     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00162 
00163     const bool motherPresent = cychpMother.getFileName() != "";
00164     const bool fatherPresent = cychpFather.getFileName() != "";
00165 
00166     bool useGenotypeCalls = genotypeCallsAvailable(cychpIndex);
00167     double errorRate;
00168 
00169     std::vector<char> vIndexGenotypeCalls;
00170     std::vector<char> vMotherGenotypeCalls;
00171     std::vector<char> vFatherGenotypeCalls;
00172     std::vector<float> vAAlleleFrequencies;
00173     std::vector<float> vBAlleleFrequencies;
00174     std::vector<unsigned char> vChromosomes;
00175 
00176     std::vector<char> vIndexAllGenotypeCalls;
00177     std::vector<char> vMotherAllGenotypeCalls;
00178     std::vector<char> vFatherAllGenotypeCalls;
00179     std::vector<unsigned char> vAllChromosomes;
00180 
00181     if (!useGenotypeCalls)
00182     {
00183         // Calls not available - try to deduce them from SCAR distributions
00184         std::vector<double> vIndexSCAR;
00185         std::vector<double> vMotherSCAR;
00186         std::vector<double> vFatherSCAR;
00187         for (int iMarkerIndex = 0; (iMarkerIndex < cychpIndex.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount()); iMarkerIndex++)
00188         {
00189             CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pMarker = cychpIndex.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex);
00190             AlleleFrequency objSearch;
00191             objSearch.SNPID = pMarker->getProbeSetName();
00192             aIterPair_t range = std::equal_range(m_vAlleleFrequencies.begin(), m_vAlleleFrequencies.end(), &objSearch, AlleleFreqComp());
00193             if (range.first != range.second)
00194             {
00195                 vIndexSCAR.push_back(pMarker->getSCAR());
00196                 if (motherPresent)
00197                 {
00198                     vMotherSCAR.push_back(cychpMother.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex)->getSCAR());
00199                 }
00200                 if (fatherPresent)
00201                 {
00202                     vFatherSCAR.push_back(cychpFather.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex)->getSCAR());
00203                 }
00204                 vAAlleleFrequencies.push_back((*range.first)->AAlleleFrequency);
00205                 vBAlleleFrequencies.push_back((*range.first)->BAlleleFrequency);
00206                 vChromosomes.push_back(pMarker->getChromosome());
00207             }
00208         }
00209         int iSCARCount = vIndexSCAR.size();
00210         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00211 
00212         CPrimeEM indexEM;
00213         CPrimeEM motherEM;
00214         CPrimeEM fatherEM;
00215 
00216         // 3 component mixture model fit to the SCAR data
00217         fit3CompModel(indexEM, vIndexSCAR);
00218         vIndexSCAR.clear();
00219         std::vector<double>().swap(vIndexSCAR);
00220 
00221         if (motherPresent)
00222         {
00223             fit3CompModel(motherEM, vMotherSCAR);
00224             vMotherSCAR.clear();
00225             std::vector<double>().swap(vMotherSCAR);
00226         }
00227         if (fatherPresent)
00228         {
00229             fit3CompModel(fatherEM, vFatherSCAR);
00230             vFatherSCAR.clear();
00231             std::vector<double>().swap(vFatherSCAR);
00232         }
00233 
00234         int gLen = indexEM.getEMEstimates()->m_class.size();
00235         for (int iSnpIndex = 0; iSnpIndex < gLen; iSnpIndex++)
00236         {
00237             vIndexGenotypeCalls.push_back(indexEM.getEMEstimates()->m_class[iSnpIndex]);
00238             if (motherPresent)
00239             {
00240                 vMotherGenotypeCalls.push_back(motherEM.getEMEstimates()->m_class[iSnpIndex]);
00241             }
00242             if (fatherPresent)
00243             {
00244                 vFatherGenotypeCalls.push_back(fatherEM.getEMEstimates()->m_class[iSnpIndex]);
00245             }
00246         }
00247         errorRate = estMaxErrorRate(indexEM, motherEM, fatherEM);
00248     }
00249     else {
00250         // Genotype calls available - use them
00251         for (int iMarkerIndex = 0; iMarkerIndex < cychpIndex.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount(); iMarkerIndex++)
00252         {
00253             CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pMarker = cychpIndex.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex);
00254             if (!pMarker->getIsGenotypeCallSet())
00255             {
00256                 continue;
00257             }
00258             vIndexAllGenotypeCalls.push_back(pMarker->getGenotypeCall());
00259             if (motherPresent)
00260             {
00261                 vMotherAllGenotypeCalls.push_back(cychpMother.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex)->getGenotypeCall());
00262             }
00263             if (fatherPresent)
00264             {
00265                 vFatherAllGenotypeCalls.push_back(cychpFather.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex)->getGenotypeCall());
00266             }
00267             vAllChromosomes.push_back(pMarker->getChromosome());
00268 
00269             AlleleFrequency objSearch;
00270             objSearch.SNPID = pMarker->getProbeSetName();
00271             aIterPair_t range = std::equal_range(m_vAlleleFrequencies.begin(), m_vAlleleFrequencies.end(), &objSearch, AlleleFreqComp());
00272             if (range.first != range.second)
00273             {
00274                 vIndexGenotypeCalls.push_back(pMarker->getGenotypeCall());
00275                 if (motherPresent)
00276                 {
00277                     vMotherGenotypeCalls.push_back(cychpMother.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex)->getGenotypeCall());
00278                 }
00279                 if (fatherPresent)
00280                 {
00281                     vFatherGenotypeCalls.push_back(cychpFather.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex)->getGenotypeCall());
00282                 }
00283                 vAAlleleFrequencies.push_back((*range.first)->AAlleleFrequency);
00284                 vBAlleleFrequencies.push_back((*range.first)->BAlleleFrequency);
00285                 vChromosomes.push_back(pMarker->getChromosome());
00286             }
00287         }
00288         errorRate = m_fErrorRate;
00289     }
00290 
00291     std::for_each(m_vAlleleFrequencies.begin(), m_vAlleleFrequencies.end(), DeleteAlleleFreq());
00292     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00293     CytogeneticsTrioAnalysis objTrioAnalysis;
00294     unsigned char ucMotherCall    = 0;
00295     unsigned char ucFatherCall    = 0;
00296     unsigned char ucFatherDuoCall = 0;
00297     double dFatherConfidence    = 0;
00298     double dMotherConfidence    = 0;
00299     double dFatherDuoConfidence = 0;
00300 
00301     if (motherPresent && fatherPresent)
00302     {
00303         dMotherConfidence    = objTrioAnalysis.calculateLODPaternity(vIndexGenotypeCalls, vMotherGenotypeCalls, vAAlleleFrequencies, vBAlleleFrequencies, errorRate);
00304         dFatherConfidence    = objTrioAnalysis.calculateLODPaternity(vIndexGenotypeCalls, vMotherGenotypeCalls, vFatherGenotypeCalls, vAAlleleFrequencies, vBAlleleFrequencies, errorRate);
00305         dFatherDuoConfidence = objTrioAnalysis.calculateLODPaternity(vIndexGenotypeCalls, vFatherGenotypeCalls, vAAlleleFrequencies, vBAlleleFrequencies, errorRate);
00306         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00307         if (dMotherConfidence    > m_fRoleValidityThreshold) {ucMotherCall    = (unsigned char)1;}
00308         if (dFatherConfidence    > m_fRoleValidityThreshold) {ucFatherCall    = (unsigned char)1;}
00309         if (dFatherDuoConfidence > m_fRoleValidityThreshold) {ucFatherDuoCall = (unsigned char)1;}
00310     }
00311     else if (motherPresent)
00312     {
00313         dMotherConfidence = objTrioAnalysis.calculateLODPaternity(vIndexGenotypeCalls, vMotherGenotypeCalls, vAAlleleFrequencies, vBAlleleFrequencies, errorRate);
00314         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00315         if (dMotherConfidence > m_fRoleValidityThreshold) {ucMotherCall = (unsigned char)1;}
00316     }
00317     else if (fatherPresent)
00318     {
00319         dFatherDuoConfidence = objTrioAnalysis.calculateLODPaternity(vIndexGenotypeCalls, vFatherGenotypeCalls, vAAlleleFrequencies, vBAlleleFrequencies, errorRate);
00320         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00321         if (dFatherDuoConfidence > m_fRoleValidityThreshold) {ucFatherDuoCall = (unsigned char)1;}
00322     }
00323     cychpIndex.setFamilialCall((unsigned char)1);
00324     cychpIndex.setFamilialConfidence((float)1);
00325 
00326     cychpMother.setFamilialCall(ucMotherCall);
00327     cychpMother.setFamilialConfidence((float)dMotherConfidence);
00328 
00329     cychpFather.setFamilialCall(ucFatherCall);
00330     cychpFather.setFamilialConfidence((float)dFatherConfidence);
00331 
00332     cychpFather.setFamilialDuoCall(ucFatherDuoCall);
00333     cychpFather.setFamilialDuoConfidence((float)dFatherDuoConfidence);
00334 
00335     // Mendelian inheritance errors
00336     if (useGenotypeCalls)
00337     {
00338         countMIE(vIndexAllGenotypeCalls, vMotherAllGenotypeCalls, vFatherAllGenotypeCalls, vAllChromosomes);
00339     }
00340     else {
00341         countMIE(vIndexGenotypeCalls, vMotherGenotypeCalls, vFatherGenotypeCalls, vChromosomes);
00342     }
00343 
00344     Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00345     Verbose::out(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::run(...) end");
00346 }
00347 
00348 void CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::fit3CompModel(CPrimeEM& em, const std::vector<double>& vSCAR)
00349 {
00350     CEMSeed seed;
00351     setSeed(seed);
00352     em.setData(vSCAR);
00353     em.setThreshold(1.1);    // force no -1 calls
00354     em.EMEstimate(seed);
00355 }
00356 
00357 double CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::estMaxErrorRate(CPrimeEM& indexEM,
00358                                                    CPrimeEM& motherEM,
00359                                                    CPrimeEM& fatherEM)
00360 {
00361     std::vector<double> errorRates;
00362     errorRates.push_back(estErrorRate(indexEM.getEMEstimates()->m_mu, indexEM.getEMEstimates()->m_sigma));
00363     if (getCychpMother().getFileName() != "")
00364     {
00365         errorRates.push_back(estErrorRate(motherEM.getEMEstimates()->m_mu, motherEM.getEMEstimates()->m_sigma));
00366     }
00367     if (getCychpFather().getFileName() != "")
00368     {
00369         errorRates.push_back(estErrorRate(fatherEM.getEMEstimates()->m_mu, fatherEM.getEMEstimates()->m_sigma));
00370     }
00371     return *std::max_element(errorRates.begin(), errorRates.end());
00372 }
00373 
00374 double CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::estErrorRate(const std::vector<double>& mean, const std::vector<double>& sigma)
00375 {
00376     const double sqrt2 = 1.414213562373;
00377 
00378     double intersect1 = findIntersections(mean[1], mean[2], sigma[1], sigma[2]).first;
00379     double intersect2 = findIntersections(mean[1], mean[0], sigma[1], sigma[0]).second;
00380 
00381     double erfArg1 = (intersect1 - mean[2])/(sigma[2]*sqrt2);
00382     double erfArg2 = (intersect2 - mean[0])/(sigma[0]*sqrt2);
00383 
00384     double errorRate1 = 0.5 + 0.5*affxstat::erf(erfArg1);
00385     double errorRate2 = 0.5 - 0.5*affxstat::erf(erfArg2);
00386 
00387     return errorRate1 > errorRate2 ? errorRate1 : errorRate2;
00388 }
00389 
00390 void CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::setSeed(CEMSeed& seed)
00391 {
00392     seed.setMu(-1.0, 0, 1.0);
00393     seed.setSigma(0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f);
00394     seed.setWeight(0.33f, 0.34f, 0.33f);
00395     seed.setMinMu(-2, -.05, .25);
00396     seed.setMinSigma(0.02f, 0.02f, 0.02f);
00397     seed.setMaxMu(-.25, .05, 2);
00398     seed.setMaxSigma(.3, .3, .3);
00399 }
00400 
00401 // Find intersection points of given gaussians
00402 std::pair<double, double> CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::findIntersections(double mean1, double mean2, double sigma1, double sigma2)
00403 {
00404     using std::abs;
00405     using std::log;
00406     using std::sqrt;
00407 
00408     const double epsilon = 1.0e-10;
00409 
00410     double intersect1;
00411     double intersect2;
00412 
00413     if (abs(sigma1 - sigma2) < epsilon)
00414     {
00415         intersect1 = intersect2 = 0.5*(mean1 + mean2);
00416     }
00417     else {
00418         double A = sigma1*sigma1 - sigma2*sigma2;
00419         double B = -2.0*(mean2*sigma1*sigma1 - mean1*sigma2*sigma2);
00420         double C = mean2*mean2*sigma1*sigma1 - mean1*mean1*sigma2*sigma2 - 2.0*sigma2*sigma2*sigma1*sigma1*(log(sigma2) - log(sigma1));
00421         intersect1 = (-B - sqrt(B*B - 4.0*A*C))/(2.0*A);
00422         intersect2 = (-B + sqrt(B*B - 4.0*A*C))/(2.0*A);
00423     }
00424     return std::make_pair(intersect1, intersect2);
00425 }
00426 
00427 void CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::countMIE(
00428                                     const std::vector<char>& vIndexGenotypeCalls,
00429                                     const std::vector<char>& vMotherGenotypeCalls,
00430                                     const std::vector<char>& vFatherGenotypeCalls,
00431                                     const std::vector<unsigned char>& vChromosomes
00432                                     )
00433 {
00434     const bool trioCase = !vMotherGenotypeCalls.empty() && !vFatherGenotypeCalls.empty();
00435     const bool duoMat   = !vMotherGenotypeCalls.empty();
00436     const bool duoPat   = !vFatherGenotypeCalls.empty();
00437 
00438     if (trioCase)
00439     {
00440         for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vIndexGenotypeCalls.size(); iIndex++)
00441         {
00442             CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00443             if (isMIE(vIndexGenotypeCalls[iIndex], vMotherGenotypeCalls[iIndex], vFatherGenotypeCalls[iIndex]))
00444             {
00445                 CNCychp::m_mMIE_Trio[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00446             }
00447             if (isMIE(vIndexGenotypeCalls[iIndex], vMotherGenotypeCalls[iIndex]))
00448             {
00449                 CNCychp::m_mMIE_Mat[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00450             }
00451             if (isMIE(vIndexGenotypeCalls[iIndex], vFatherGenotypeCalls[iIndex]))
00452             {
00453                 CNCychp::m_mMIE_Pat[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00454             }
00455         }
00456     }
00457     else if (duoMat)
00458     {
00459         for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vIndexGenotypeCalls.size(); iIndex++)
00460         {
00461             CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00462             if (isMIE(vIndexGenotypeCalls[iIndex], vMotherGenotypeCalls[iIndex]))
00463             {
00464                 CNCychp::m_mMIE_Mat[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00465             }
00466         }
00467     }
00468     else if (duoPat)
00469     {
00470         for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vIndexGenotypeCalls.size(); iIndex++)
00471         {
00472             CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00473             if (isMIE(vIndexGenotypeCalls[iIndex], vFatherGenotypeCalls[iIndex]))
00474             {
00475                 CNCychp::m_mMIE_Pat[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00476             }
00477         }
00478     }
00479 }
00480 
00481 inline bool CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::isMIE(char genIndex, char genMother, char genFather)
00482 {
00483     // Mendelian error if either:
00484     //  Mother  Father  Child
00485     //  AA      AA      AB|BB
00486     //  AA      BB      AA|BB
00487     //  AA      AB      BB
00488     //  AB      AA      BB
00489     //  AB      BB      AA
00490     //  BB      AB      AA
00491     //  BB      AA      AA|BB
00492     //  BB      BB      AA|AB
00493     //
00494     return
00495         genMother == 0 && genFather == 0 && (genIndex == 1 || genIndex == 2)  ||
00496         genMother == 0 && genFather == 2 && (genIndex == 0 || genIndex == 2)  ||
00497         genMother == 0 && genFather == 1 && genIndex == 2                     ||
00498         genMother == 1 && genFather == 0 && genIndex == 2                     ||
00499         genMother == 1 && genFather == 2 && genIndex == 0                     ||
00500         genMother == 2 && genFather == 1 && genIndex == 0                     ||
00501         genMother == 2 && genFather == 0 && (genIndex == 0 || genIndex == 2)  ||
00502         genMother == 2 && genFather == 2 && (genIndex == 0 || genIndex == 1);
00503 }
00504 
00505 inline bool CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::isMIE(char genIndex, char genParent)
00506 {
00507     // Mendelian error if either:
00508     //  Parent  Child
00509     //  AA      BB
00510     //  BB      AA
00511     //
00512     return
00513         genParent == 0 && genIndex == 2  ||
00514         genParent == 2 && genIndex == 0;
00515 }
